item.description:
Let's meet at the Au Bon Pain in Davis Square at 5:00pm and take the subway into the hatch shell.

Bring blankets or chairs to sit on. People often bring picnics and sit on the lawn for hours. I am thinking people aren't going to want to sit around too long, but we also want to be able to find a place to sit, so I am planning for us to get there around 5:45pm. I have found out that 7:00 as was originally planned will be too late.

Schedule:
4:00pm Oval opens
8:30pm Concert begins
10:00pm Concert ends
item.name: Boston Pops Concert - Weather permitting (Time Change)
